content.html: I'm never uneasy about Muslims or refugees or migrant families passing me on the street. No, it's pissed-off, entitled, gun-toting, professed Christian white bigots emboldened by our former President who worry me. johnpavlovitz.com/2018/06/30/ame…
content.value:
I'm never uneasy about Muslims or refugees or migrant families passing me on the street.

No, it's pissed-off, entitled, gun-toting, professed Christian white bigots emboldened by our former President who worry me.

johnpavlovitz.com/2018/06/30/ame…
